data.message: That's cool that Em performed, but it wasn't a new song or anything like that. Eminem needs to come out with some new music. PC culture is ruining entertainment and I feel that Shady would be the perfect antidote.

replies.message: He doesn't have to .....
That's how you stay a legend. Drake is just going to overplay til he falls
I'd rather hear them overplay Eminem than overplay Drake. And if you're such a big fan then why don't you want him to add morning  songs to his catalogue?
Needs to? Hahahah he's a legend. He'll do whatever the fuck he wants.
Better to live as a legend than noone
Every Stan's waitin 4 some new tracks... Maybe that'll finally become truth...
Shady XV doesn't count.
Shady xv does count lol... how can u say it doesnt? It had new tracks an a seperate cd for greatest hits...
He doesn't need to. I bet if he prepared a tour and only played his 'old' tracks, people would still go nuts.
He gettin hella old

If you're a big fan Emma, then when you listen to his music, you understand why he doesn't want to make more music. If you're a big fan you respect the artist for their life choices. He said he was retiring after Recovery but came back with The Marshall Mathers LP 2 still. Let the man be done, like he wants to be

He literally just gave us an album last summer with songs by himself and legends (Tech N9ne, Busta, ect.) FOR A GOD DAMN MOVIE. You can listen to EM while watching a good movie. Or just go look up the southpaw soundtrack. That was just last summer, give him a break he's probably got more on the way, but he's not dropping anymore "warning" or "girls" type diss songs, he's only looking to spit his best.
You can hear in his latest songs like "Phenomenal" and "Kings never die" that he's not even close to done, so idk where people think he's itching to retire. He's just looking to do different.
But I do remember him wanting to stop after Recovery Sara, but my feeling is in sobriety he's found a new energy.
Speedom, Best Friend, the hills, (all from 2015) he's doing Features as well, idk what more the fans want. If you haven't heard Speedom yet, you're just missing out on Em.

I'm talking retiring from making a full length Eninem album. But I know he will always make music. Yelawolf's 'Love Story' album was produced by Eminem and those beats are the shit. I could listen to Em's beats all day long, no bars or anything. He is a musical genius and a God
What songs did em perform?
His career ended when he became sober
I agree Emma! cause Shady don't give a fuck

Emma Kate  because he doesn't need to... Do you even notice how mainstream Drake is to where he can drop any song or steal lyrics and it's all good.... Just the fact that you even think Drake is shit is funny. Real hip hop isn't drake. Drake was a plan by cash money in 2008 wayyy before anyone knew about him they had a plan for him already.
Any real eminem fan would know how to find new music by eminem. Just because he's not on t.v. doesn't mean he's not making music.

Chris Croze makes the crowd go crazy at the shelter where Eminem did 8 mile
